items.title: Stocks sink in another brutal day, as Trump's tariffs send global shockwaves
items.description: Investors, businesses and consumers all seem terrified of how President Trump's tariffs could upend the global economy.

items.title: National Security Agency chief fired as Trump ousts another top military officer
items.description: Air Force Gen. Timothy Haugh served just over a year as director of the NSA, the spy agency that collects cyber intelligence worldwide. He's the lates...

items.title: Comedian Russell Brand is charged with rape and assault in U.K.
items.description: The criminal charges were announced one and a half years after Brand was accused of sexual misconduct by four women in the fall of 2023.

items.description: Employers added 228,000 jobs in March, showcasing a solid labor market. But uncertainty over tariffs and tepid consumer spending may weigh on job grow...

items.title: Trade war escalates as China hits back with 34% tariffs on all U.S. goods
items.description: Analysts say the escalating trade tensions between the U.S and China will make a near-term deal to end the trade war "highly unlikely".
